label.text: Server Information
Mod Features:
- Important:Crops can now be picked up with [EEEE22]E[-] again, but punching them will give way more yield.
- [00D12A]Trees[-] now turn into Stumps when destroyed.
- Lots of [FF0034]colored[-] text.
- Zombies now turn into the gore blocks on death 20% of the time.
- No more spread on guns, where you shoot is where it fires.
- Auger/Chainsaw noises lowered.
- All headshots should be an instant kill except maybe on very tough zombies.
- Body backpacks/loot bags now do not despawn for 6 days IRL.
- Crosshair turns off when aiming down sights on all weapons except bows.
- Crops do not get destroyed when harvested.
- Cars now have chances to drop Wheels when harvesting.
- Re-added [00D12A]terrain[-] based movement speed.
- [EEEE22]Hay Bales[-] are 0 fall damage again.
- Gain 5 skill points per level, all skills cost 1 points, level gates removed for skills.
- Tons of recipes added and tons of recipes changed.
- You should be able to make a schematic of a weapon you find at a workbench.
- You gain 3x the amount of ammo when crafting it.
- Traders now open basically 24/7, don't abuse it.
- https://github.com/RobbieW69/My-7DTD-Modlets
